description:
Just as the group is about to get used to the strange class, it`s time for their Center Exam.  They`ll be going into the world of "Border Break" and piloting Blast Runners in an attempt to destroy the enemy`s core.  Since this exam is important, they`ll be getting far more medals than usual.  But during the exam, Center-sensei has an emergency message.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: センター先生のセンター試験
